mapper.select: SELECT t.targets_name,t.targets_id, GROUP_CONCAT(o.options_name) AS options_name FROM targets_options tos,targets t,OPTIONS o,evaluates_targets et WHERE et.evaluates_id=#{evaluates_id} AND INSTR(tos.targets_id,t.targets_id)>0 AND t.targets_id=tos.targets_id AND tos.options_id=o.options_id AND et.targets_id=t.targets_id GROUP BY tos.targets_id
